title: Lottie Moss nails androgynous chic in an all-black ensemble at Millie Bobby Brown's jewellery launch
text:
She reportedly had a secret fling with Jamie Laing behind her ex boyfriend and his best pal Alex Mytton's back.

But Lottie Moss appeared to brush aside the recent claims as she attended Millie Bobby Brown's Pandora Me launch party at The Old Truman Brewery in east London on Thursday evening.

The model, 21, displayed her effortlessly chic style at the jewellery event as she sported a black blouse, tucked into a pair of classic trousers.

Androgynous chic: Lottie Moss attended Millie Bobby Brown's Pandora Me launch party at The Old Truman Brewery in east London on Thursday evening

Upping the style ante, the younger sister of Kate Moss boosted her physique in patent platform boots, and toted her essentials in a white crossbody bag.

The socialite opted for minimalist chic when it came to her accessories, decorating her look with a selection of silver bangles.

With her blonde locks styled into loose waves, the Pac Sun model complemented her beauty with dewy foundation and black mascara.

Looking good: The model, 21, displayed her effortlessly chic style at the jewellery event as she sported a black blouse, tucked into a pair of classic trousers

Monochrome magic: Upping the style ante, the younger sister of Kate Moss toted her essentials in a white crossbody bag (pictured with Jess Woodley)

All in the details: The socialite opted for minimalist chic when it came to her accessories, decorating her look with a selection of silver bangles (pictured with Vanessa White)

Chic: With her blonde locks styled into loose waves, the Pac Sun model complemented her beauty with dewy foundation and black mascara

Her ousting comes less than a week after it was revealed by MailOnline that Made In Chelsea lothario Jamie, 30, enjoyed a brief relationship with Lottie during a trip to Los Angeles last year – despite her being co-star Alex’s former girlfriend.

Mutual pals were left stunned when Jamie made the same mistake months later by starting a relationship with Sam Thompson’s ex Sophie 'Habbs' Habboo, 25, ultimately ending their friendship.

A source revealed to MailOnline: 'Jamie and Lottie got together during a trip to LA last year. Alex was extremely hurt when he found out – Jamie was supposed to be one of his best friends and it felt like the ultimate betrayal.'

Standing out: Singer Vanessa oozed elegance in a patterned maxi skirt and a black cardigan, while reality star Jess flashed her abs in a crop top and joggers

Sisters' night out: Jess Wright, 34, partied hopped from Madame Tussauds London's Tales from The Chamber event to attend the jewellery bash with her sibling Natayla, 19

Flair for fashion: Ex-TOWIE star Jess caught the eye in a nude blouse and white straight-leg trousers

Starry: Model Chloe Lloyd turned heads in a checked blouse (L), while fellow catwalk queen Roxy Horner opted for a leather jumpsuit (R)

Lottie was also close friends with Jamie's ex-girlfriend and former co-star Frankie Gaff, 25, prior to the fling, with the girls even living together.

After the relationship came to light among Chelsea circles, Lottie moved out of the flat they shared.

An insider added: 'To make things worse, Lottie was good friends and flatmates with Jamie’s ex Frankie Gaff. She tried to keep what happened with Jamie secret but ended up moving out of Frankie’s flat when it all came to light.'

Alex, 28, dated model Lottie for nine months before they split in 2018 over their busy work schedules.

Low-key: Vogue star Neelam Gill put on a casual display in a slogan T-shirt and straight-leg denim jeans

Having fun: The gal pals posed for snaps as they caught up at the star-studded industry event

Host of the evening: Actress Millie, 15, is a global ambassador for jewellery brand Pandora and has released a range of bracelets and charms for the company dubbed Pandora Me

Vibrant: The Stranger Things star rocked silk pyajama-style co-ords for the event, which were covered in a quirky black printed pattern all over

Meanwhile, Sam Thompson, 27, has suffered a huge falling out with Jamie over his relationship with Habbs.

Jamie and Habbs grew close just a few months after she ended her romance with Sam – leaving him devastated.

Sam, who’s now dating Love Island’s Zara McDermott, 22, has refused to speak to Jamie for months amid fears his behaviour will never change.

Lottie’s friendship with former Made In Chelsea star Frankie was also ruined – with the two no longer in contact after the betrayal.

Betrayed: She reportedly had a secret fling with Jamie Laing behind her ex boyfriend and his best pal Alex Mytton's back (Lottie and Alex pictured in 2016)
description: The model, 21, appeared to brush aside the recent claims as she attended Millie Bobby Brown's Pandora Me launch party at The Old Truman Brewery in east London on Thursday.
